description:
We currently have an immediate need for an experienced Escrow Officer for a well established Financial Services Company in Los Angeles. Previous experience with Purchase/Resale Escrow files is required. This is a temp to hire position paying between $32 to $36hr per hour based on experience.

Company Description

Our Staff is passionate about recruiting and we take pride in matching our candidates with the right clients. Our goal is to insure job satisfaction along with a competitive pay and a positive working environment. We will work hard to help you with your next career move within the Title, Escrow & Mortgage industry.
